nodeList.description: Hail of Arrows deals damage in a larger area
You have a chance to gain a stack of {Dusk Shroud} each second for 2 seconds while inside the area, granting you glancing blow chance and dodge rating. This effect can stack.

node.description: Hail of Arrows deals damage in a larger area
Hail of Arrows lasts longer.

nodeList.description: Hail of Arrows now also grants a stack of {Dusk Shroud} to allies each second for 2 seconds while inside the area.

nodeList.description: Improves {Barrage of Arrows'} base critical strike chance.

node.description: Hail of Arrows now also shoots a {Barrage of Arrows} on use dealing bow physical damage, but costs more mana. This does not scale with damage over time.
Hail of Arrows deals damage in a larger area

nodeList.description: {Barrage of Arrows} immobilizes enemies for a short duration. Rare enemies and bosses are slowed instead.

node.description: Hail of Arrows now also shoots a {Barrage of Arrows} on use dealing bow physical damage, but costs more mana. This does not scale with damage over time.

nodeList.altText: Frailty causes enemies to deal 6% less damage per stack for 4 seconds (multiplicative with other modifiers). Stacking up to 3 times.
nodeList.description: Hail of Arrows has a chance to apply {Frailty} to enemies each second.

node.description: Hail of Arrows deals damage in a larger area

nodeList.altText: Armour Shred reduces armour by 100, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack.

node.altText: Crit Vulnerability lasts 4 seconds and causes enemies to have +5% chance to be critically hit and causes them to have 10% less crit avoidance. This effect can stack.
node.description: Hail of Arrows has a chance to inflict enemies with {Crit Vulnerability} each second.
Hail of Arrows deals more damage to ignited enemies (multiplicative with other modifiers).

Hail of Arrows' base physical damage and added bow damage is converted to fire. Consequently this damage scales with increases to fire damage, but not increases to physical damage.

Bleed chance from all sources is converted to ignite chance and effects related to bleed now depend on ignite instead.

This has no effect if Hail of Arrows is converted to cold with {Crystal Arrows} or to poison with {Acid Rain}.
Hail of Arrows deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but in a smaller area (multiplicative with other modifiers).

node.description:
Hail of Arrows' base physical damage and added bow damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to physical damage. It also has a chance to freeze enemies each second.

All slow chance from this tree is converted to chill chance and effects related to slow now depend on chill instead.

This has no effect if Hail of Arrows is converted to poison with {Acid Rain}.
Hail of Arrows has a chance to slow enemies each second.

nodeList.description: Hail of Arrows lasts longer.
Hail of Arrows deals more bow damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) over its duration scaling up to a maximum. This does not affect damaging ailments.

node.description: Hail of Arrows lasts longer.

nodeList.description:
Hail of Arrows lasts significantly longer (multiplicative with other modifiers), but you can only have one Hail of Arrows active at a time. 

Using Hail of Arrows again causes the old instance to stop.

nodeList.description:
Hail of Arrows' base physical damage and added bow damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to physical damage. It also has a chance to freeze enemies each second.

All slow chance from this tree is converted to chill chance and effects related to slow now depend on chill instead.

This has no effect if Hail of Arrows is converted to poison with {Acid Rain}.

node.description: Hail of Arrows has a chance to slow enemies each second.

nodeList.description:
Hail of Arrows is now channeled and can be retargeted while you are channelling. It costs less initial mana, but rapidly drains your mana. You do not regenerate mana while channelling. 

Channelled Hail of Arrows' delay is halved, and increases to its delay are halved.

node.description:
Hail of Arrows lasts significantly longer (multiplicative with other modifiers), but you can only have one Hail of Arrows active at a time. 

Using Hail of Arrows again causes the old instance to stop.
Hail of Arrows deals more bow damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) over its duration scaling up to a maximum. This does not affect damaging ailments.
Hail of Arrows lasts longer.

nodeList.altText: {Barrage of Arrows} is not converted to poison.
nodeList.description:
Hail of Arrows' base physical damage and added bow damage is converted to poison. Consequently this damage scales with increases to poison damage, but not increases to physical damage.

Bleed chance from all sources is converted to poison chance.
